channel.title: CVE Feed for LogicalDOC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LogicalDOC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-47418|2024-08-03T14:55:07.904Z -- logicaldoc -- logicaldoc%20enterprise
item.description: LogicalDOC Enterprise and Community Edition (CE) are vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") cross-site scripting (XSS) condition in the document version comments.

item.title: CVE-2022-47416|2024-08-03T14:55:07.825Z -- logicaldoc -- logicaldoc%20enterprise
item.description: LogicalDOC Enterprise is vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") cross-site scripting (XSS) condition in the in-app chat system.

item.title: CVE-2022-47415|2024-08-03T14:55:08.401Z -- logicaldoc -- logicaldoc%20enterprise
item.description: LogicalDOC Enterprise and Community Edition (CE) are vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") cross-site scripting (XSS) condition in the in-app messaging system (both subject and message bodies).

item.title: CVE-2022-47417|2024-08-03T14:55:08.305Z -- logicaldoc -- logicaldoc%20enterprise
item.description: LogicalDOC Enterprise and Community Edition (CE) are vulnerable to a stored (persistent, or "Type II") cross-site scripting (XSS) condition in the document file name.
